title: POCT plans AI-driven clinical workflow overhaul in UP public hospitals by April
description: Lucknow, Jan 14 (PTI) Healthcare solutions provider POCT Group on Wednesday said it plans to deploy large-scale artificial intelligence-based systems to digitise clinical workflows in Uttar Pradesh’s public healthcare facilities by April, building on its existing laboratory digitisation programme in the state. The company shared details of its upcoming AI interventions on the sidelines of […]

title: Aon expands Data Center Lifecycle Insurance Program to $2.5 billion, strengthening resilience for AI-driving digital infrastructure
description: DUBLIN, Jan. 14, 2026 /PRNewswire/ -- Aon plc (NYSE: AON), a leading global professional services firm, today announced a $1 billion expansion of its proprietary Data Center Lifecycle Insurance Program (DCLP), increasing total capacity to $2.5 billion. The expansion responds to accelerating global investment in cloud computing, artificial intelligence and digital infrastructure and increasing complexity of risks across the data center lifecycle.
content: DUBLIN, Jan. 14, 2026 /PRNewswire/ -- Aon plc (NYSE: AON), a leading global professional services firm, today announced a $1 billion expansion of its proprietary Data Center Lifecycle Insurance Program (DCLP), increasing total capacity to $2.5 billio... [4336 chars]

title: Makes Of 'Stranger Things' Face Backlash Over Alleged Use Of ChatGPT To Write Final Episodes
description: The creators of 'Stranger Things', Matt and Ross Duffer, are facing fresh criticism days after the release of the final season of the decade-old series. Following the release of a documentary linked to the making of the show, fans have accused the Duffer Brothers of using artificial intelligence tools to help write the final episodes.

title: Frankenstein: What Mary Shelley's 'Swiss' creature teaches us about AI
description: At a time when artificial intelligence shapes our work and recreation, Mary Shelley's Frankenstein helps us reflect on the unexpected consequences of innovation.
content:

title: The Lasting Impact of Steam Engines on Germany's Economy: Lessons for AI Adoption
description: Research reveals that regions in Germany where steam engines were widely adopted in the 19th century continue to experience economic benefits, such as higher wages and better educational attainment. The study suggests that early adoption of artificial intelligence could yield similar advantages for today's economies.
content:
A new study indicates that the steam engine continues to influence Germany's economy, highlighting the potential benefits of early adoption of technology, such as artificial intelligence.
According to research from the ROCKWOOL Foundation Berlin, are... [395 chars]

title: India at the AI crossroads: Leadership ambitions or an AI testbed?
description: Artificial intelligence: India stands at a crucial point in the global AI race. While possessing a large user base, the nation must foster domestic innovation to avoid becoming merely a data provider. China's aggressive scaling and investment offer lessons. India needs to develop its own foundational AI models to truly compete and create substantial value in the AI landscape.

title: Exclusive: China's customs agents told Nvidia's H200 chips are not permitted, sources say
description: Chinese customs authorities told customs agents this week that Nvidia's H200 artificial intelligence chips are not permitted to enter China, according to three people briefed on the matter.
content:
Chinese government officials also summoned domestic technology companies to meetings on Tuesday where they were explicitly instructed not to purchase the chips unless necessary, two of the people and a third source said.

description: British technology minister Liz Kendall said on Tuesday the government was seeking a “reset” on ‍plans to overhaul copyright rules to accommodate artificial intelligence
content:
